slightlyMoreHelpfulOrbIndicators.name: Better Green Orb + Black Orb Indicators (MAKE SURE TO READ!)
slightlyMoreHelpfulOrbIndicators.description:
<cp>***__RESTART REQUIRED. CHANGES FROM THIS SETTING (MAY OVERRIDE/BE OVERRIDDEN BY) CHANGES FROM ACTIVE TEXTURE PACKS.__***</c>
Uses slightly more descriptive orb indicators for green orbs and black orbs.

issues.info: Ping me <cl>(@erymanthus)</c> in the Geode SDK Discord server's <cl>#help</c> channel if you need help. <cr>DMs are NOT accepted.</c>
